text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Both Fuji Kiseki and I are at a loss for<n>how to
overcome the pressure she's<n>feeling. We watch a
DVD of one of her<n>mother's performances in the
hopes we<n>can find a hint.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Surely, even she must feel pressured as astage actor. But as we watch, she doesn'tgive off that impression. Fuji Kiseki can'tfigure out why.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I suggest we ask her mother directly how<n>she's
able to keep her cool on stage,<n>and Fuji Kiseki
agrees. We settle on a<n>date to meet her mother.
